name: Nightmare
movement: 60 ft. walking speed, 90 ft. flying speed
description: A Nightmare is a large fiendish horse wreathed in flames, with a dark, smoky mane and glowing red eyes. Its hooves burn with fire as it gallops.
memorable: This creature combines striking fire abilities with high mobility, instilling dread in those who encounter it.
goals: Typically summoned to serve as a steed for evil entities and necromancers, it excels in combat and stealth missions.
relations: Often serves powerful fiends or necromancers.
environment: Can be found in dark, fiery planar locations or near evil-aligned creatures.
strengths: High mobility with flying speed, fire immunity, and formidable melee attacks.
weaknesses: Challenge rating of 3 indicates it is best suited for encounters with lower-level adventurers.
attacks: Delivers powerful hooves attacks, dealing bludgeoning damage accompanied by fire damage, with the potential to knock foes prone.
most_powerful_ability: Ethereal Shift allows it to magically transition between planes, providing tactical advantages.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 11, representing moderate awareness in stealth situations.
skills: Offers fire resistance to willing riders, while punishments incur for unauthorized riders.
additional_information: Leaves burning hoofprints that can damage creatures.
Can create chaotic conditions in battle.
Equipped with a significant blend of physical and magical abilities.
Can grant fire resistance to allies.
test_queries: large fiend that travels between planes
